name: 3 Missing, 4am
summary: You are alone in a dark place.

name: 3 Minutes to Midnight
summary: 3 Minutes to Midnight is Scarecrow Studio ’s first adventure game with its development led by Jan Serra It is a classic point-and-click adventure game telling the story of Betty Anderson. Do you love unexpected stories and puzzling twists, as well as the feeling of satisfaction that comes when you solve riddles – the harder they are the better? You can’t stop laughing at funny dialogues? You can’t get enough of the "give me more" feeling after you discover the last clue? Then you will love this game! Move around beautifully drawn 2D scenes full of details. Experience a very personal, complex, and interactive story driven by exploration and puzzle-solving. Meet the peculiar characters of this game, and find out about their background stories. Furthermore, there are multiple Easter eggs hidden in the game. Can you spot them all?

name: 3 Minute Heroes
summary: 3 Minute Heroes is a real-time strategy game that combines the genres of tower defense, deck building, and roguelike. Place your champions, use cards and keep your home safe for 3 minutes!

name: 3 Minute Walk
summary: 3 Minute Walk is a COVID-19 anxiety simulator.

name: 3 Minutes Mystery
summary:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling role of a detective with easy controls in this mystery game.
Discover concealed evidence within intricate illustrations and uncover the truth behind each case!
While the illustrations may appear straightforward at first glance, gathering the depicted evidence and solving the mysteries will genuinely challenge your wits.

name: 3 minutes Mystery 2
summary: Unravel the New Mystery! You are the one to uncover the truth behind the crime scene by finding hidden evidence.

name: 3M Spain Foundation: Stem + VR
summary:
An educational project of 'Scientific dissemination' to encourage STEM vocation in children.

Includes 4 individual experiences of virtual reality (Science, math, technology and engineering block) to be lived in groups of 3 players (Required)

During each one, children visit different age and scenarios, where they learn specific content to the subject matter (STEM) and meet challenges in a collaborative way.
